definition: theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: More dramatic is the introduction of goal-driven search engine marketing campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 更戏剧性的是，目标驱动的搜索引擎营销活动的介绍。

sentences.english: Oh, she said with an overly dramatic hit to her forehead.
sentences.chinese: 哦，她极富戏剧性地伸手拍一下额头，说。

sentences.english: Like its mythological namesake, the nebula is associated with a dramatic transformation.
sentences.chinese: 如它的希腊神话同名者，星云与一戏剧性的变化相关。

sentences.english: Don't dramatize the affair so much , just give us the facts.
sentences.chinese: 不要戏剧性的讲述这个事情，我们要知道事实。

sentences.english: A dramatic example would be shooting LCD screens.
sentences.chinese: 一个戏剧性的例子是射击液晶屏幕。

sentences.english: The scene inside the shelter was dramatic beyond words.
sentences.chinese: 隐蔽所内景象的戏剧性用语言难以描述。

sentences.english: A series of dramatic events marked the end of the Weimar Republic.
sentences.chinese: 一系列戏剧性的事件标志着魏玛共和国的终结。

sentences.english: Remember to dramatise these facts when you include them in your screenplay.
sentences.chinese: 记住你要将这些事实戏剧性的编织在你的剧本里。

sentences.english: Fortune or misfortune, I feel this world is full of histrionic.
sentences.chinese: 无论幸运或不幸时，我都觉得这世界充满了戏剧性。

sentences.english: Obviously, this was a dramatization, since an entire cam crew went along.
sentences.chinese: 整个摄制组都去了，所以这报道显然具有戏剧性。

sentences.english: Late sun backlights mountains and fog in this dramatic scene.
sentences.chinese: 夕阳背光山和雾在这一戏剧性场面。

sentences.english: This is the political lesson of the euro drama to date.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个迄今为止的，欧元戏剧性的政治课。

sentences.english: Mr Jennings said that the impact of the heavy rains was “dramatic”.
sentences.chinese: 杰宁斯称，近日大雨的冲击是“戏剧性的”。
戏剧性地表现你的特征。

sentences.english: Chapter One explores the dramatic structure in Of Mice and Men.
sentences.chinese: 第一章论述《人鼠之间》的戏剧性结构。
一个具有戏剧性的大话？

definition: thought-provoking/worth thinking over/to provide food for thought
shift in the trend of events/turnaround/plot shift in a book/turn in the conversation
bizarre/paradoxical/a paradox (from Daoist classic Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子)
the mountain road twists around each new peak (idiom)/(of a mountain road) twisting and turning/fig. an opportunity has come unexpectedly/things have taken a new turn
